name: Birthday Mayhem
description:
Movement:

Arrow keys to move

Once in reach, click on the objects to interact with them

Objective:

As you were getting ready for your party, the cake arrived from the bakery. A sudden rush of joy sprinted through your spine. You take a look at the cake and realize something was off. Something was missing. Then you quickly realize that there are no candles! You dashed inside in search for the candles, but you forgot which closet it was in. Luckily, you saw some clues sprinkled around the house, leading to something; possibly the candles. With no other ideas, you decide to set fourth on this quest in order to find the lost candles.
